title: Beautiful Quiet Neighborhood  2+1 Unfurnished Apt

posting_body: Sierra Ridge Apartments - A place to call home!
You can now apply online at <URL>
Sierra Ridge Apartment Homes is located in Tehachapi, just minutes away from amazing restaurants and A brand new Wal-Mart supercenter that is NOW OPEN!
Sierra Ridge offers the comforts of home while offering the convenience of urban living and provide many amenities that suit your active lifestyle.
Our on-site management team is committed to responsive service and meticulous maintenance assuring that you can always come home to the very best.
Call or come by today and you'll discover Sierra Ridge Apartments is the perfect home for you.
